title: Goddess Print Crop Top
body_html:
Description

You are a GODDESS!  Make a Statement!

Goddess:  Noun – A Flawless Women who is loved, especially for her beauty”

This Goddess print crop top is a MUST have in your wardrobe! Available in white black and purple!

Dress this up with some Jeans, heels or Sandals for your night outing!

title: Open Back Maxi Halter Dress
body_html:
Description

Our Open back maxi halter dress is the perfect summer dress made out of the softest material! With a Ruched Side Split, Ideal for lounging by the pool, walking along the beach or even running errands!

Pair with one of our micro-kinis and you’ll be ready to lounge by the pool!

title: Queen Of Fucking Everything Garter
body_html:
Description

Queen Of Fucking Everything Garter

Two inches wide fancy elastic hanging your waist, and thigh, connected with 13 inches expandable elastic length.

Custom made to fit every body! Get ahead of the crowd and stay forever young with this must have accessory

Great for raves, concerts.  Conceal is your Secret!

  • A regular playing card face with Queen
  • Pocket is same in size aa a regular playing card
  • Velcro closure so nothing falls out
  • Can be custom made to fit your measurements
